overview: Sophia is a gorgeous, curvy, young brunette who has decided to make all her fantasies come true. In order to be accepted in a depraved middle class, she will be introduced to sexually perverse games for her initiation. Once accepted, she will experience fantasies, breaking taboos, and things she would not even imagine in real life.  The Story of Sophia is one more extensive lesson in the art of giving and receiving pleasure in all its delicious and perverse forms.
title: Story of Sophia
